chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
s: state
p: proc A

Goal:
alwsafe s p <-> after s p (fun=> xPredT)

Premises:
Notation xPredT := (fun=> True)
after : forall A : Type, state -> proc A -> (A -> state -> Prop) -> Prop
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc A | Ret : A -> proc A | Act : action W A this -> proc A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc B -> (B -> proc A) -> proc A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc A -> proc A | WithInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc A -> proc A Arguments proc [this W] _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [this
Notation alwsafe s p := (always s p (fun=> xPredT))
aftI : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : Prop) (Q : A -> state -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> after s p (fun (v : A) (s' : state) => P -> Q v s') < -> (P -> after s p (fun v : A => [eta Q v]))
alwI : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : Prop) (Q : state -> proc A -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> always s p (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc A) => P -> Q s' p') < -> (P -> always s p (fun s' : state => [eta Q s']))
alwA : forall (A B : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : B -> state -> proc A -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> always s p (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc A) => forall x : B, P x s' p') < -> (forall x : B, always s p (fun s' : state => [eta P x s']))
alwI' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : Prop) (Q : state -> proc A -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> always_sc s p scs (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc A) => P -> Q s' p') < -> (P -> always_sc s p scs (fun s' : state => [eta Q s']))
aft_bnd : forall (A B : Type) (p1 : proc A) (p12 : proc B) (pp2 : A -> Pred (proc B)) (s1 : state) (P : B -> state -> Prop), p12 \In pcat p1 pp2 -> after s1 p1 (fun (v : A) (s : state) => forall p : proc B, p \In pp2 v -> after s p P) -> after s1 p12 P
alwA' : forall (A B : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : B -> state -> proc A -> Prop), alwsafe_sc s p scs -> always_sc s p scs (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc A) => forall x : B, P x s' p') < -> (forall x : B, always_sc s p scs (fun s' : state => [eta P x s']))
alw_refl : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> P s p
alw_refl' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p sc P -> P s p
alw_safe : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> forall sc : schedule, safe p sc s
alw_safe' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p (sc :: scs) P -> safe p sc s
alw_coh : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> s \In coherent
alw_imp : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P1 P2 : state -> proc A -> Prop), (forall (s0 : state) (p0 : proc A), s0 \In coherent -> P1 s0 p0 -> P2 s0 p0) -> always s p P1 -> always s p P2
alw_coh' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p scs P -> s \In coherent
proc_progress : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule), s \In Coh W -> safe p sc s -> good p sc -> exists (s' : state) (p' : proc A), pstep s p sc s' p'
alw_imp' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P1 P2 : state -> proc A -> Prop), (forall (s0 : state) (p0 : proc A), s0 \In coherent -> P1 s0 p0 -> P2 s0 p0) -> always_sc s p scs P1 -> always_sc s p scs P2
Actions.safe_local : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall s : state, Actions.skip_safe W s -> coh p (getStatelet s l)
Actions.skip_step : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.skip_safe W s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
alw_bnd : forall (A B : Type) (p1 : proc A) (p12 : proc B) (pp2 : A -> Pred (proc B)) (s1 : state) (P : state -> B -> Prop), p12 \In pcat p1 pp2 -> always s1 p1 (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc A) => forall (p : proc B) (v : A), p2 = Ret v -> p \In pp2 v -> always s2 p (fun (s : state) (q : proc B) => forall v0 : B, q = Ret v0 -> P s v0)) -> always s1 p12 (fun (s : state) (p : proc B) => forall v : B, p = Ret v -> P s v)
alwsafe_bnd : forall (A B : Type) (p1 : proc A) (p12 : proc B) (s1 : state) (pp2 : A -> Pred (proc B)), p12 \In pcat p1 pp2 -> always s1 p1 (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc A) => forall (p : proc B) (v : A), p2 = Ret v -> p \In pp2 v -> alwsafe s2 p) -> alwsafe s1 p12
Actions.skip_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> Actions.action W V this
skip_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> Actions.action W V this
unit_coh : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> w = Unit < -> s = Unit
alw_envs : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc A) (s2 : state) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s1 p P -> network_rely W this s1 s2 -> always s2 p P
alw_step : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s1 p P -> pstep s1 p sc s2 q -> always s2 q P
Actions.can_send = fun (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s : state) => (l \in dom s) && (this \in nodes p (getStatelet s l)) : protocol -> nid -> Label -> state -> bool
alw_envs' : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (s2 : state) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s1 p scs P -> network_rely W this s1 s2 -> always_sc s2 p scs P
cohE : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects U V K) (s : state), Coh V s < -> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh (inj_ext w) s2])
Actions.skip_step_total : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol) (pf : getProtocol W l = p) (V : Type) (f : forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) (s : state) (S : Actions.skip_safe W s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), Actions.skip_step pf f S s' r
Actions.skip_step_sem : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol) (pf : getProtocol W l = p) (V : Type) (f : forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) (s1 : state) (S : Actions.skip_safe W s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), Actions.skip_step pf f S s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
schedule_ind : forall P : schedule -> Prop, P ActStep -> P SeqRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (SeqStep s)) -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (InjectStep s)) -> P InjectRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (WithInvStep s)) -> P WithInvRet -> forall s : schedule, P s
